channel.title: 508 coding question
channel.description: where do i code in normal stuffs like adding objects, monsters etc. for 508? i cant seem to find the place for it

item.title: 508 coding question
item.dc:creator: @bite_the_man bite the man
item.description:
@bite_the_man wrote:

depending on the development of the source there should be a file called npcspawn. search for it and either add something to it such as

spawn = 494 3164 3488 0 0 0 0 0 Banker spawn = 495 3165 3488 0 0 0 0 0 Banker

or if there is something in there just copy and paste another and change the coords and npc id

NPCs are the easy ones lol objects…u need a larger tut for that and i aint got the time

Read full topic

item.title: 508 coding question
item.dc:creator: @zero_max1 zero max
item.description:
@zero_max1 wrote:

[quote=“Denoria, post:2, topic:283368”]If you cannot find the file to even code, not to be hard, but then don’t start a server, no offense at all but this will just be called a leached failure.

Thanks,
Denoria.[/quote]

^ Bullshit, that count as both harassment and spam^

so yeah, i am a noob, but i do know how to code 317 and 474, i am just stuck on finding the correct files (there are no “client” file in 508s)and you are not helping a bit,you douchbag,and i am not even sure if you know the answer,you might just be someone like me

^ go think about it ^

Does anyone else can help me on this question?

Read full topic
